metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8961 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in libraries/error_report.lib.php in theerror-reporting feature in phpMyAdmin 4.1.x before 4.1.14.7 and 4.2.xbefore 4.2.12 allows remote authenticated users to obtain potentiallysensitive information about a file's line count via a crafted parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8961` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.2.12-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.2.12-1').
